articles.description: Crystal Palace have suffered their worst start to a Premier League season since 1992-93 - but is it as bad as it seems?
articles.title: Nottingham Forest 1-0 Crystal Palace: What has gone wrong for Eagles?

articles.description: Shakhtar were forced to leave Donetsk a decade ago, and the challenge of running an elite club has increased since Russia's invasion in 2022.
articles.title: Shakhtar Donetsk: How Ukrainian club are dealing with stark realities of war

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Nottingham Forest vs Crystal Palace in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Nottingham Forest vs Crystal Palace - live text & score updates

articles.description: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk says "discussions are ongoing" with the club about extending his deal, which runs out next summer.
articles.title: Virgil van Dijk: Liverpool captain in talks about new deal at Anfield

articles.description: All-rounder Liam Livingstone will captain England during their white-ball tour of West Indies after Jos Buttler suffers a setback in his recovery from a calf injury.
articles.title: England in West Indies: Jos Buttler to miss ODIs; Liam Livingstone to captain tourists

articles.description: A Lionel Messi-inspired Inter Miami have already lifted silverware in 2024, securing the Supporters’ Shield earlier this month after finishing top of Major League Soccer’s overall standings, but there is still work to do if they are to be crowned champions.
articles.title: Will Messi help bring record-breaking Inter Miami the MLS Cup?

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Portland Thorns and United States forward Sophia Smith, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 award.
articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 contender Sophia Smith

articles.description: Brazil forward Neymar makes his first appearance for Al-Hilal in over a year after recovering from surgery on a ruptured anterior cruciate ligament and meniscus in his left knee.
articles.title: Neymar: Brazil forward returns for Al-Hilal one year after ACL injury

articles.description: Bayern Munich and Marseille are interested in Marcus Rashford, Manchester United are willing to listen to loan offers for Antony, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Rashford, Antony, Totti, Gloukh, Kilicsoy

articles.description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta calls on his side to use the "pain" of their first defeat in six months as motivation for their Champions League meeting with Shakhtar Donetsk.
articles.title: Arsenal v Shakhtar Donetsk: Mikel Arteta calls on Gunners to use 'pain' of Bournemouth defeat
